doc:
Lorànt Deutsch https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lor%C3%A0nt_Deutsch 0 Lorànt Deutsch (French pronunciation: ​[lɔrɑ̃.dœtʃ], born Laszlo Matekovics on 27 October 1975), is a French actor and writer. Deutsch was born in Alençon to a Hungarian-Jewish father and a Romanian mother.
Deutsch married actress Marie-Julie Baup on 3 October 2009. An ardent Catholic, Deutsch claims to be a royalist. Lorànt_Deutsch ( French_pronunciation : [_lɔrɑ̃.dœtʃ_] , born Laszlo_Matekovics on 27_October_1975 ) , is a_French_actor_and_writer . Deutsch was_born in Alençon to a_Hungarian-Jewish_father and a_Romanian_mother . Deutsch married actress_Marie-Julie_Baup on 3_October_2009 . An_ardent_Catholic , Deutsch claims_to_be a_royalist .
